law.catch_line: A judicial probate may be reopened and a new proceeding held if, following a request by an intereste...
law.text: A judicial probate may be reopened and a new proceeding held if, following a request by an interested person within 18 months from the death of the decedent, the court finds the existence of any fact which would permit the holding of a proceeding pursuant to § 5-304(b) of this title.
